uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config

Class KConfigNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config.KConfigNode

  • public class KConfigNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a node in a MEKON configuration file (see KConfigFile).

      • getResource

        public java.io.File getResource(java.lang.String id,
                                KConfigResourceFinder finder)
        Provides a File object derived from the value of the specified attribute, representing an existing resource (file or directory) that can be located from the class-path.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of relevant attribute
        finder - Finder for locating required resource
        Returns:
        Relevant File object
        Throws:
        XDocumentException - if no value for specified attribute
        KSystemConfigException - if value does not represent a valid resource-path, or if a resource of the required type does not exist at the specified location

      • getResource

        public java.io.File getResource(java.lang.String id,
                                KConfigResourceFinder finder,
                                java.io.File defaultValue)
        Provides a File object derived from the value of the specified attribute, representing an existing resource (file or directory) that can be located from the class-path.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of relevant attribute
        finder - Finder for locating required resource
        defaultValue - Value to return if no value for attribute
        Returns:
        Relevant File object, or null if no value for specified attribute
        Throws:
        KSystemConfigException - if value found for specified attribute but does not represent a valid resource-path, or if a resource of the required type does not exist at the specified location
